You can start daily comparisons with AUS asx200 ADR $ BHP , 1st print at opening gives $ DAX and $ DJI direction & 1st TARGET for the day, again it is accurate about 80% of time, YEN intervention related by BOJ $ DAX connection = CHINA industrial activity (AUS exports iron ore & OIL)

@fanofmurreymath Another imp daily and long term mirror is VW owned MAN DE ticker in xetra http:// MAN.SE is a Giant truck manufacturer in Frankfurt, Most active stock in Germany, it tells $ DAX movements 15min ahead of time, also correlates with $ DJI >only on bull moves<

While it appears $ DJI is ahead of $ DAX recently, do % compare for 1 week, then 1 month, etc.. You will find that correlation is very constant at about 85% for years now. Think it started DEC 2011 when a Recession was announced in EU and EUR/USD started declining. US Bull start<
